articles.author: Eric Cheung, Hassan Tayir
articles.title: The great social media migration: Sudden influx of US users to RedNote connects Chinese and Americans like never before - CNN
articles.description: As Supreme Court justices ponder the future of TikTok in the United States, a growing number of American social media users have responded by moving to an unlikely alternative: Xiaohongshu, a hugely popular social media app in China.

articles.title: Starbucks ends its ‘open-door’ policies - CNN
articles.description: Starbucks doesn’t want to be America’s public bathroom anymore.
articles.content:
Starbucks doesnt want to be Americas public bathroom anymore.
Starbucks is scrapping a policy that had let anyone hang out at its cafes or use the restrooms without making a purchase. The new rules … [+2977 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: In Photos: Mars Devoured By ‘Wolf Moon’ In Stunning Sight For U.S. Sky-Watchers - Forbes
articles.description: January’s full moon, the “Wolf Moon,” rose alongside Mars at its brightest, occulting it for a short period as seen from North America. Here are the best images.
